00016 template <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3=void>
00017 struct vectorize {
00018     typedef T1 BinaryFunction;
00019     typedef T2 Argument1;
00020     typedef T3 Argument2;
00021 
00022     typename boost::mpl::if_<
00023         boost::mpl::and_<
00024             typename ExpressionTraits<Argument1>::IsScalar,
00025             typename ExpressionTraits<Argument2>::IsScalar
00026         >,
00027         typename BinaryFunction::result_type,
00028         detail::BinaryOpExpression<Argument1,Argument2,BinaryFunction>
00029     >::type type;

00033 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00034 struct vectorize<T1,T2,void> {
00035     typedef T1 UnaryFunction;
00036     typedef T2 Argument;
00037 
00038     typedef typename boost::mpl::if_<
00039         typename ExpressionTraits<Argument>::IsScalar,
00040         typename UnaryFunction::result_type,
00041         detail::UnaryOpExpression<Argument,UnaryFunction>
00042     >::type type;

00055 template <typename Scalar, typename UnaryFunction>
00056 #ifndef DOXYGEN
00057 typename boost::enable_if<typename ExpressionTraits<Scalar>::IsScalar,
00058                           typename UnaryFunction::result_type>::type
00059 #else
00060 typename UnaryFunction::result_type
00061 #endif
00062 vectorize(
00063     UnaryFunction const & functor,
00064     Scalar const & scalar

00074 template <typename Derived, typename UnaryFunction>

00077     UnaryFunction const & functor,
00078     ExpressionBase<Derived> const & operand
00079 ) {

00094     (ExpressionTraits<Scalar1>::IsScalar::value
00095      && ExpressionTraits<Scalar2>::IsScalar::value),
00096     typename BinaryFunction::result_type
00097     >::type
00098 #else

00102     BinaryFunction const & functor,
00103     Scalar1 const & scalar1,
00104     Scalar2 const & scalar2

00115 template <typename Derived1, typename Derived2, typename BinaryFunction>
00116 detail::BinaryOpExpression<Derived1,Derived2,BinaryFunction>
00117 vectorize(
00118     BinaryFunction const & functor,
00119     ExpressionBase<Derived1> const & operand1,
